title: Team Challenged (Challenger 1) Ranked 5's LF Support Main
body:
Hello,
Team Challenged (We are in challenger) is looking for a Support main, as our other current support had to leave.
Add myself "TC Fucking Frank" or our team leader "TC Executioner"  about the position. 
You must be serious about it, and be a good support, our last one will be hard to live up to
